component.name: Path of Building
component.summary: A powerful build planner for Path of Exile

description.p:
Path of Building Community Fork - A powerful build planner for Path of Exile
This is a fork of Openarl's Path Of Building that includes many extra features not in the base version of PoB
It's running on Linux through replacing SimpleGraphics with https://github.com/meehl/rusty-path-of-building
Replace non-ASCII characters in text input with '?'
Use `smithay-clipboard` crate for clipboard support on Wayland
Fix missing window title during installation step
Fix UI scaling factor not being applied at startup on X11
Now self updates the Path of Building data
